text: David Zurabishvili (; born 16 March 1957) is a Georgian politician. He was a member of the Parliament of Georgia from 2004 to 2008. In 1996 with Levan Ramishvili, Givi Targamadze and Giga Bokeria founded the Liberty Institute, a non-profit, non-partisan, liberal public policy advocacy foundation based in Tbilisi. He was deputy chair of parliamentary faction of United National Movement and deputy chair of the Committee on Education, Culture and Science. In 2005 he left parliamentary majority. == Other websites == *Biography at APLR *Prime News Online *The Chronicle of Higher Education Category:1957 births Category:Members of the Parliament of Georgia Category:Politicians from Tbilisi Category:Living people
title: David Zurabishvili
